      • getSessionSubject

        public Subject getSessionSubject​(SecurityAuth session)
        Get the cached Subject. If the Subject is not in the cache then authenticate again to retrieve it.
        Specified by:
        getSessionSubject in interface SecurityStore
        Parameters:
        session - contains the authentication data
        Returns:
        the authenticated Subject with all associated role principals or null if not authenticated or JAAS is not supported by the SecurityManager.
